name: memoPostcodePlugin

infos.name: Postcode.de Adress-Validierung und Autovervollständigung
infos.description:
Mit dem Postcode.eu Plugin können Sie sich auf genaue Rechnungs- und Lieferadressen in Ihrem Webshop und CRM verlassen. In einem single-line Adresserfassung Feld, das mit intelligenter Type-Ahead-Technologie für vorausschauende Eingaben arbeitet, werden Kundenadressen sofort durch genaue und offizielle globale Standortdaten validiert. Die bestmögliche Datenqualität am Eingang macht eine weitere Datenbankbereinigung überflüssig und reduziert automatisch Kosten und Zeit für verpasste Lieferungen. Darüber hinaus wird die Customer Experience verbessert, indem eine schnellere Möglichkeit zur Eingabe korrekter Adressdaten bereitgestellt wird.

In den Niederlanden müssen Benutzer bei der Eingabe ihrer Adresse nur Postleitzahl und Hausnummer angeben, alle anderen Adressfelder werden sofort ausgefüllt.

Das Plugin unterstützt alle Adressdaten in Deutschland, Österreich, Schweiz, Niederlande, Belgien, Luxemburg, Frankreich & Großbritannien. Die Liste wird ständig erweitert und regelmäßig kommen neue Länder hinzu.

Folgende Adressquellen werden verwendet:

Deutschland - Deutsche Post
Österreich - Bundesamt für Eich- und Vermessungwesen - Adressregister - der österreichischen Regierung
Schweiz - Gebäude- und Wohnungsregister, Swisstopo - der Schweizer Regierung
Niederlande - Basisregistraties Adressen en Gebouwen (BAG) der niederländischen Regierung
Belgien - Centraal Referentieadressenbestand (CRAB) der belgischen Regierung
Luxembourg - Administration du cadastre et de la topographie (ACT) der luxemburgischen Regierung
Frankreich - Base Adresse Nationale -der französischen Regierung
Großbritannien - Royal Mail - PAF

Registrierung eines Postcode.eu-Kontos

Postcode.eu bietet jedem neuen Benutzer eine Testphase zum Testen der API. Für die produktive Nutzung ist jedoch ein Postcode.eu-Abonnement erforderlich. Das Erstellen eines Kontos dauert nur wenige Minuten: Erstellen Sie ein Konto.

Über postcode.eu

Postcode.eu wurde 1999 gegründet und ist ein vertrauenswürdiger und bekannter Partner für Adressinformationen in den Niederlanden. Postcode.eu liefert Datenbanken an Regierungsbehörden , Postdienste, Versorgungsunternehmen, Banken und Versicherungen. Die Postcode.eu API wird täglich von Tausenden von Webshops verwendet. Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter https://www.postcode.eu/de
infos.installationManual: Gültige und aktive API-Anmeldedaten von Postcode.de sind erforderlich.
infos.shortDescription: Das Postcode.de-Plugin bietet eine Autovervollständigung für die Adressüberprüfung. Mit seiner prädiktiven Technologie bietet das Plugin Vorschläge und erkennt Tippfehler.
infos.highlights:
Verbesserung von User Experience
Beschleunigung der Adresseingabe 
Vereinfachung des Checkouts 
Reduzierung von nicht zugestellte Pakete aufgrund falscher Adressen
infos.features:
Direkte Adressvalidierung im Checkout
Erkennung von Tippfehlern mit anhand von Type-Ahead-Technologie
Blitzschnelle sofortige Adressvorschläge
Korrekt formatierte Adressen
Adressdaten vieler europäischer Länder
Offizielle und aktuelle Daten

infos.name: Postcode.eu Address Validation and Autocompletion
infos.description:
Postcode.eu Plugin

With the Postcode.eu Plugin you are assured of accurate billing and shipping addresses in your webshop and CRM. In a single-line address capture, that works with smart type-ahead predictive technology, customer addresses get instantly validated by accurate & official global location data. The best possible data quality at the point of entry will take away the need for further database cleaning and automatically reduces costs and time for missed deliveries. On top of that the user experience gets improved by providing a quicker way to enter correct address details.

For the Netherlands, users only need to provide a postcode and house number when entering a billing and/or shipping address, all other address fields will be instantly completed.

The plugin supports all address data in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, The Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, France & the UK. The list is constantly expanding and new countries are added on a regular basis.

The following address sources are used:

Germany - Deutsche Post
Austria - Bundesamt für Eich- und Vermessungwesen - Adressregister - of the Austrian government
Switzerland - Gebäude- und Wohnungsregister, Swisstopo - of the Swiss government
The Netherlands - Basisregistraties Adressen en Gebouwen (BAG) from the Dutch government
Belgium - Centraal Referentieadressenbestand (CRAB) from the Belgian government
Luxembourg - Administration du cadastre et de la topographie (ACT) from the Luxemburg government
France - Base Adresse Nationale - from the French government
United Kingdom - Royal Mail - PAF

Registering a postcode.eu account

postcode.eu offers every new user a trial period to test the API. However, a Postcode.eu subscription is required for production use. Creating an account only takes a few minutes: create an account.

About postcode.eu

Established in 1999, Postcode.eu is a trusted and well-known partner for address information in the Netherlands. Postcode.eu supplies databases to government agencies , postal services, utility companies, banks, and insurance companies. The Postcode.eu API is used by thousands of webshops every day. Learn more at https://www.postcode.eu/en.
infos.installationManual: Valid and active API credentials from Postcode.eu are required.
infos.shortDescription: The Postcode.eu plugin offers an autocomplete for international address validation. With it’s predictive technology, the plugin offers suggestions and recognises typing errors.
infos.highlights:
Improve user experience
Speed up address entry 
Simplify the checkout
Reduce undelivered packages due to wrong addresses
infos.features:
Direct address validation in the checkout
Recognises typing errors with type-ahead predictive technology
Lightning fast instant address suggestions
Correctly formatted addresses
Address data of many European countries
Official and up to date data

comments.text: Nette extensie. Wordt netjes voorzien van updates en nieuwe functionaliteiten. Ook Internationale adressen werken top.
comments.headline: Top extensie. Doet wat je er van verwacht! ??

comments.text: I'm using this plugin for multiple shops and it is working great. Very easy implementation. The support for this plugin is awesome. I asked for an additional functionality and they released a new version the same day with said functionality. Would recommend!
comments.headline: Works like a charm and great support

changelog.text: • Fixed an issue merging custom address data.

Compatibility update


Shopware 6.5

  • Added compatibility for Shopware 6.5


Shopware 6.4

  • The 6.5 version of the plugin is only compatible with Shopware 6.5 and up. For Shopware 6.4 please keep using the 6.4 version of the plugin. Features and fixes will be released for both versions where possible.

• Improved compatibility with older Shopware versions. Now compatible with Shopware 6.4.3.0 and higher.
  • Fixed an issue merging custom address data.

The caching update


New features

  • Added caching to requests for Dutch addresses. Results are cached for a maximum of 1 hour.
  • Added caching to the API availability check, as this could lead to the wrong input fields being shown.


Bugfixes

  • 6.3.12 reintroduced a bug fixed in 6.3.11, enabling empty addresses to be registered once more. This has been fixed again. Affected versions 6.3.11 and 6.3.12.

• Improve error handling with P.O. boxes in the frontend.
  • Improve UX when an invalid address is returned while the customer is still typing.

• Fixed an issue that prevented the registration of new customers when the sales channel could not be determined during address composition. Affected version 6.3.11.
  • Lowered PHP 8 requirement to allow PHP 8.0 in addition to 7.4.

• Prevented registering empty addresses by submitting the form before validation could be completed.
  • Fixed an issue whereby the autocomplete country select settings would not load. This affected versions 6.3.6 - 6.3.10.
  • Added compatibility for ajax CSRF mode.
• Improve compatibility with Default Registration Country plugin.
• Fixed form validation when submitting the form with an invalid Dutch house number addition.
• Fixed an issue where the plugin was missing a dependency while trying to recompile the store.

• Fixed: When entering a non-existing Dutch address there was a possibility for the house number addition to be shown as "undefined".
  • Fixed form validation when trying to submit the form with an invalid Dutch address.

• An issue which occured when using an unsupported country has been fixed
  • General updates and improvements

• Fixed an issue with address composition not setting the correct values in the system config in newer Shopware 6.4 versions. (Known affected versions: Shopware 6.4.17.2 and higher)
  • Updated default street composition to include a space between housenumber and addition. Existing installations will have to update the composition manually.
  • Improved handling of Dutch address input fields while typing: Fields should no longer be overwritten while the customer is still typing.
  • Improved handling of invalid house number additions for the Dutch address API: A warning is displayed when an invalid addition has been entered, and a list of available options will be shown.
• Loading of the styling in older Shopware versions has been fixed.

• Added additional available data for Spain
  • Fixed a bug with overwriting Dutch addresses.

• Fixes several problems with Shopware 6.4.20
  • Load supported countries after fresh installation

Critical: v6.3.0 contains a critical error, please update to this version as soon as possible!

  • Fixes missing service PHP error.
  • Fixes an issue with Dutch address fields being emptied if the address can't be found.

Rebuilt from the ground up to prepare for future Shopware versions

  • Attention! Some config values have changes. Please check your configuration after updating!


New features

  • Activate international autocomplete per supported country.
  • View your Postcode.eu usage in the administration.
  • PO boxes can now be disabled for all supported countries.
  • Address composition allows you to define what address data will be stored in which fields.
  • Added support for headless setups.


Changes

  • The frontend is now built using vanilla JavaScript, replacing the old jQuery implementation, in preparation for Shopware 6.5 and Bootstrap 5.
• Fix an issue with Dutch addresses showing "null" as house number addition, when entering a non-existing house number addition
• Improve storefront url handling

• Improved support for Acris "Street & house number in 2 fields"
  • Added option to disable International Autocomplete entirely
• Fixed an issue where additional address fields were not shown.
• Fixed an issue with dutch housenumber additions not being stored internally.
• Fixed a bug with saleschannels that only have one country available.
• Fixed a bug where dutch addresses could not be overwritten when no valid address was found.

• Fixed z-index of the autocomplete address list when in a modal.
  • Changed the snippet for invalid postcodes. Dutch address API only.
  • Added a toggle for P.O. boxes. Disabling the toggle will disallow P.O. boxes to be selected as address. Dutch address API only.

• Added address field compatibility for Shopware 6.4.7+
  • Updated frontend styling
• Changed field type of the housenumber field to number.
• Disabled autocomplete hint for the international address field.
• Removed `autocomplete="off"` from Postcode.eu library to keep correct autocomplete functionality

• Added an option list for housenumber additions
  • Fixes an issue when switching countries while a valid autocomplete address has been selected
  • Fixes an issue when using the browser's history autofill
• Fixes an issue in the addressbook

• Compatibility Update
  • Fixed an issue where the autocomplete field was empty when editing an address

• Fixed empty fields being marked valid even if they're required.
  • Added autofill hints to address fields

• Fixed a bug where hidden fields could be set as required.
  • Updated autocomplete library to version 1.2
• Fixed a bug where fields pertaining to dutch addresses were not being reset when changing the country

• Fixed a bug causing the dutch address override to always show
  • Fixed a bug when no configuration had been set yet
• Updated to support API version 3
Added option for dutch addresses to allow customers to overwrite the found streetname and city. Only works for dutch addresses using the Dutch Address API, not with the autocomplete API.
• Corrected an error regarding missing content parameter

• Added option to use the Dutch Address API for Dutch addresses.
  • Fixed several bugs related to autocomplete
• First Release based on autocomplete
